effect.black_white: Lowers the target’s Attack and Special Attack by two stages. User faints.
effect.black_2_white_2: Lowers the target’s Attack and Special Attack by two stages. User faints.

short_effect.black_white: Lowers the target’s Attack and Special Attack by two stages. User faints.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Lowers the target’s Attack and Special Attack by two stages. User faints.

flavor_text.black_white: The user faints when using this move. In return, it harshly lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user faints when using this move. In return, it harshly lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk.
